text:
@drsangitareddy @COVID19 @aiims_newdelhi @PMOIndia @MoHFW_INDIA @HospitalsApollo @drharshvardhan Sad ,very sad ,A great loss indeed at this time ,may be he was not given proper PPE, or he could not get proper protection.this cause may be avoided for our medical staff.
Mr Harshwardhan ,can you listen and hear ,and feel the loss.
